Values.name: Hardware Dealer
Values.dialogue_text: A cybernetic Artificer greets you over the comms. Looks like he has some hardware to unload.

Values.name: Shady Hardware Dealer
Values.dialogue_text: A dark cybernetic Artificer greets you over the comms. Looks like he has some hardware to unload.
Values.look_text: A grungy <> is selling his wares.
